landing.noapp: Mehiã be nàzã dɔwɔnu aɖeke o {{ BRAND }} le wò telefon alo tablɛt dzi!
landing.intro: {{BRAND}} ({{TRANSLITERATION}}) nye mɔ nyui aɖe si dzi nàto ado go xɔlɔ̃ yeyewo.  {{ BRAND }}, míetia ame bubu le vome eye míeɖea mɔ na wò be nàƒo nu ɖekaɖeka.   <6>Ðoɖowo kple nɔnɔmewo</6>, kple <8>Nutoa me ƒe mɔfiamewo</8> na info tso de do's kple don'ts le zazã me {{ BRAND }}. {{ BRAND }} video chat nye AI moderated gake moderation aɖeke mede blibo o.  {{ BRAND }}
landing.disclaimer: <0>Ele be nàxɔ ƒe 18 (alo ame akpa gãtɔ le se nu le wò ʋɔnudrɔ̃ƒe) alo esi wu nenema hafi nàte ŋu azãe {{BRAND}}</0>.  {{BRAND}}'s <4>Ðoɖowo kple nɔnɔmewo</4> hena nyatakaka bubuwo.  <6>https://www.kadodo dedie.org/dziɖuɖuwo</6> abe alesi teƒe bubuwo hã le ene.
landing.pleaseleave: Taflatse dzo le Omy.live eye nàyi ame tsitsiwo ƒe nyatakakadzraɖoƒe aɖe boŋ nenye be emae nye nusi dim nèle eye nèxɔ ƒe 18 (alo ame akpa gãtɔ le se nu le wò ʋɔnudrɔ̃ƒe) alo wu nenema.
landing.termscheck: Ne ède dzesi aɖakaa la, èlɔ̃ ɖe edzi be yeto agree to be bound by me {{BRAND}}'s <3>Ðoɖowo kple nɔnɔmewo</3>, . <5>Ameŋunyatakakawo ŋuti ɖoɖo</5> kple <7>Nutoa me ƒe mɔfiamewo</7>.
landing.agecheck: Màte ŋu azã dɔwɔnu sia ne mèxɔ ƒe 18 haɖe o alo ne èxɔ ƒe si nye ame tsitsi le se nu le wò nuto me o.  <1>Ðoɖowo kple nɔnɔmewo</1> hena nyatakaka bubuwo. <3>Ne ède dzesi aɖakaa la, èlɔ̃ ɖe edzi eye nèle eɖem fia be yexɔ ƒe 18 (alo ame akpa gãtɔ le se nu le wò ʋɔnudrɔ̃ƒe) alo wu nenema.</3>
landing.acceptandcontinue: Lɔ̃ ɖe edzi eye nàyi edzi

chat.language: Mi ame evea siaa miedoa gbe ɖeka.  "Any" le gbegbɔgblɔ ƒe nyatakakadzraɖoƒea be wòawɔ dɔ.

cookies.message: Míezãa cookies tsɔ naa wò ɣeyiɣi si nèzãna le nyatakakadzraɖoƒea nyona ɖe edzi, ke hã àte ŋu agbe.  <1>àkpɔ boblododowo enuenu</1> esi wònye be míate ŋu akpɔe ɖa be èkpɔ wo xoxo alo mèkpɔ wo o ta o.
cookies.privacy: Àte ŋu asrɔ̃ nu geɖe tso ale si míezãa cookies le míaƒe... <1>Ameŋunyatakakawo Ŋuti Ðoɖo</1>

alerts.keepclean: Na wòanɔ dzadzɛ eye nàkpe ɖe ŋuwò to NSFW ƒe nuwɔna ŋuti nyatakakawo gbɔgblɔ me

error.adblocker: Míate ŋu aɖe mɔ na wò be nàwɔ ema o elabena èle Ad blocker zãm
error.disableadblocker: <0>Míele mɔ kpɔm be míaƒe nyatakakadzraɖoƒea le vivi sem na wò. </0><1>Akpe na mi ɖe miaƒe kpekpeɖeŋu ta!</1>
